name: Stranded on Fox Island
description:
This version is playable but currently unfinished. It will updated to the full version in the next few days.

Wander the beach of Fox Island collecting trash. Luckily for you, the Fox can convert trash into tools to escape the island.

Note:

  • Settings for the way too high sensitivity. Sorry
  • The game does not currently save
  • Tools are unlocked from the start. This is obviously not intended so try not to use them until you've unlocked them. 

Fox statue by GrimbiXcode - https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:1736162
